rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0001
rows.name:
You guys have been helping out a lot
lately, huh? It makes us Iiran soldiers
feel pretty inadequate by comparison.

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Whaaa? You think I'm always just
lazing around, trying to avoid doing any
real work?!

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0003
rows.name:
H-hey! Keep it down, OK? Don't say
that out loud... Someone might hear
you.

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I don't want anyone to cotton on to my
lazy lifestyle! Then I might actually
have to do something...

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Wh-what?! You say the king's son is
here, so it's too late?! Noooo!
My perfect life, ruined...

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Er, hey there, Adel, sir! Say, when
did you get here? Hah haaa...

rows.label: tlk70000041_03_msg0007
rows.name:
I'd, um, really appreciate it if you didn't
tell anyone about this.
